question: Janak and BSS-793 are two varieties of which crop?
explanation: The Bt-brinjal varieties approved for field testing by the Genetic Engineering Appraisal Committee (GEAC) recently are “Janak” and “BSS-793”. They contain an insect-killer gene Cry1Fa1 (event 142), derived from the soil-dwelling bacterium, Bacillus thuringiensis (Bt).
